title: Deus.Ex.Human.Revolution.Directors.Cut.XBOX360-COMPLEX
description:
- C O M P L E X

P R E S E N T S   :

Deus Ex Human Revolution Directors Cut

Region      : Region Free           Languages: English
Size        : 2 DVDs                Genre    : Action
Platform    : XBOX 360              Date     : 10/2013

Release Info:

Deus Ex: Human Revolution - Director's Cut is the enhanced return to one
of the most critically-acclaimed video game franchises of all time.
The game tells the story of Adam Jensen, a man cybernetically augmented
against his own will who soon finds himself in the middle of a global
conspiracy to which he holds the key. By offering players the chance
to advance through the game in multiple and vastly different ways,
Deus Ex: Human Revolution Director's Cut challenges the foundations
of gaming and provides an immersive experience where every choice
has a lasting consequence

- Ultimate Deus Ex: Human Revolution experience: Take advantage of a
multitude of improvements, features and additional content that bring t
his already critically-acclaimed adventure to whole new levels
Tap into Microsofts SmartGlass technology using your tablet: Adam
Jensen's newest augmentation, the Neural Hub, offers an immersive
and empowering experience, right at the tips of your fingers
- Absolute fusion of action and role-play: A unique combination of
action-packed close-quarter takedowns and intense shooting, offering
a vast array of augmentations and upgrades for the many weapons at
your disposal
- Multi-solution structure: Choose how to accomplish each mission using
combat, hacking, stealth or social mode to create a customized experience
to suit any gaming style
- Diverse customization: Engage in combat and challenges utilizing deep,
specialized character augmentations and weapon upgrades
- Augmented visuals: Never has the Cyber Renaissance setting that masterfully
blends near future and Renaissance era styles been so visually stunning
- Explore the world: Traverse numerous locales across the globe - each
with its own distinct art direction -- in Adam's search to uncover a
worldwide conspiracy.

Notes
